meanings.definition: In a frivolous or irresponsible manner.
meanings.sent1: She spent her money flightily on unnecessary things.
meanings.sent2: He always behaves flightily when it comes to his responsibilities.
meanings.sent3: The cat played with the toy flightily, as if it was the most important thing in the world.
meanings.sent4: Her thoughts fluttered flightily from one idea to the next.
meanings.sent5: The wind danced flightily through the trees, carrying whispers of secrets.

meanings.definition: In a manner that is easily distracted or changeable.
meanings.sent1: The child's attention wandered flightily during the boring lecture.
meanings.sent2: She flitted flightily from one task to another without completing any.
meanings.sent3: The butterfly moved flightily from flower to flower, unable to settle.
meanings.sent4: His emotions shifted flightily, making it hard to predict his reactions.
meanings.sent5: The clouds drifted flightily across the sky, changing shapes with each passing moment.
